summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2818 for the improvement of Day Street and Irving Street, each from Thirty-second Avenue South to Thirty-fourth Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, by the construction of concrete walks, concrete stairways, wood cross walks, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 33835, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
